author: Saraswathy Nagarajan
title: How this Kerala home guard reaches out to ‘guest workers’ and wins hearts
description: A video of Karunakaran from Kozhikode conversing in Hindi with guest workers goes viral
content: K Karunakaran, a home guard in Kozhikode, became a social media sensation after a video of him conversing in Hindi with workers from outside Kerala went viral on Sunday (March 30). The clip shows him explaining what COVID-19 is all about and how one has to st… [+3423 chars]
